points.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

case.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
case.localized_title: Des informations sont fournies sur la manière dont vos données personnelles sont utilisées
case.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.

points.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect

case.title: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect
case.localized_title: Des détails sont fournis sur le type d'informations collectées.
case.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.

points.title: You maintain ownership of your uploaded images and reviews

case.title: You maintain ownership of your content
case.localized_title: Vous restez propriétaire des images et des commentaires que vous avez téléchargés.
case.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.

points.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

case.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles peuvent être utilisées à des fins de marketing
case.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.

points.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

case.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
case.localized_title: Il y a une date de la dernière mise à jour des accords.
case.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

points.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

case.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
case.localized_title: Votre adresse IP est collectée, ce qui peut être utilisé pour connaître votre position approximative.

points.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

case.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez refuser les communications promotionnelles
case.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.

points.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service

case.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service
case.localized_title: Des tiers sont impliqués dans l'exploitation du service

points.title: Your content can be deleted if you violate the terms

case.title: Your content can be deleted if you violate the terms
case.localized_title: Votre contenu peut être supprimé si vous ne respectez pas les conditions d'utilisation.
case.description: Content infringing the Terms of Service (or the Acceptable Use Policy or equivalent)  may be removed, with or without notice.

points.title: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed

case.title: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed
case.localized_title: Il n'est pas permis d'explorer le site, de le parcourir ou d'y accéder par des moyens automatisés.

points.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content

case.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content
case.localized_title: Le service dispose d'une utilisation non exclusive de votre contenu
case.description: The service can pay for your content and you are allowed to make it commercially available to other services/parties.

points.title: You are not allowed to use pseudonyms, as trust and transparency between users regarding their identities is relevant to the service.

case.title: You are not allowed to use pseudonyms, as trust and transparency between users regarding their identities is relevant to the service.
case.localized_title: Vous n'êtes pas autorisé à utiliser des pseudonymes, car la confiance et la transparence entre les utilisateurs en ce qui concerne leur identité sont importantes pour le service.
case.description: You must provide your legal name and pseudonyms aren't allowed, but it makes sense for the purposes of this service.

points.title: The terms for this service are translated into different languages

case.title: The terms for this service are translated into different languages
case.localized_title: Les conditions de ce service sont traduites en plusieurs langues
case.description: Although there's generally a unique binding language for the terms, they are translated to allow all users to understand the agreement they're accepting, no matter their native language.

points.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

case.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
case.localized_title: Vous êtes suivi par des balises web, des pixels de suivi, des empreintes de navigateur et/ou des empreintes d'appareil.
case.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.

points.title: Extra data may be collected about you through promotions

case.title: Extra data may be collected about you through promotions
case.localized_title: Des données supplémentaires peuvent être collectées à votre sujet dans le cadre de promotions
case.description: Additional personal data may be collected through contests, surveys, promotions, petitions or sweepstakes.

points.title: You waive your right to a class action.

case.title: You waive your right to a class action.
case.localized_title: Vous renoncez à votre droit à une action collective.
case.description: The right to be represented in a class action (or representative action) exists in the US and some European countries. It allows people who have been similarly injured by the same accused to take legal action by a single lawsuit instead of individually. Some Terms of Service try to limit that right. By agreeing to them, you could waive (= renounce to) your right to a class action, which might reduce your chances to be successful in a case.

points.title: A license is kept on user-generated content even after you close your account

case.title: A license is kept on user-generated content even after you close your account
case.localized_title: Une licence est conservée sur le contenu généré par l'utilisateur même après la fermeture du compte.
case.description: The service may still use your content and display it after you stopped using it by closing your account. The case applies to terms requiring users to grant them a perpetual license over that content.

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
case.localized_title: Les cookies de tiers sont utilisés pour les statistiques
case.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.

points.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

case.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
case.localized_title: Les pixels de suivi sont utilisés dans la communication entre les services et les utilisateurs.
case.description: The service tracks the user count or some actions of the user; this is usually used for statistics. For example, emails sent by a service can contain a pixel tag, which is a small, clear image that can tell them whether or not you have opened an email and what your IP address is.

points.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting and device fingerprinting
points.analysis: Also: "we use something known as “cross-device tracking.” This can be done with or without the use of cookies. [...] With cross-device tracking, Booking.com is able to track user behavior across multiple devices. As part of cross-device tracking, we may combine data collected from a particular browser or mobile device with data from another computer or device that’s linked to it"

case.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
case.localized_title: Vous êtes suivi par des balises web, des pixels de suivi, des empreintes de navigateur et des empreintes d'appareil.
case.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.

points.title: This service tracks you on other websites

case.title: This service tracks you on other websites
case.localized_title: Ce service vous suit sur d'autres sites web
case.description: The service may use tracking technologies in third-party websites to track your online activity while you aren't visiting their Site.

points.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation

case.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation
case.localized_title: Ce service partage vos données personnelles avec des tiers qui ne sont pas essentiels à son fonctionnement
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.

points.title: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising

case.title: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles sont utilisées pour faire de la publicité ciblée par des tiers.
case.description: Your Personal Information is traded and shared with advertising companies to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites. Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile.

points.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.

case.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
case.localized_title: Les en-têtes Do Not Track (DNT) sont ignorés et vous êtes suivi de toute façon même si vous avez défini cet en-tête.
case.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.

points.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels

case.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels
case.localized_title: Vous êtes suivi par les cookies/pixels des médias sociaux.
case.description: These types of cookies/pixels send information to social media sites when you interact with the service.

points.title: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users

case.title: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users
case.localized_title: Le service prétend être conforme à la CCPA pour les utilisateurs californiens.
case.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the California Consumer Privacy Act.

points.title: Your personal data is pseudonymized into statistics

case.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles sont pseudonymisées dans des statistiques
case.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.

points.title: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

case.title: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
case.localized_title: Il est conseillé de consulter régulièrement les conditions d'utilisation, bien qu'en cas de changements importants, le service en informera les utilisateurs.
case.description: The service may update the Terms without notice, but if they significantly change the agreements in a manner that importantly and/or negatively affects the way the service is used, users will be notified.

points.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

case.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
case.localized_title: Ce service est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation individuelle et non commerciale.
case.description: Users can't use the Service for commercial purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for personal, individual purposes.

points.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties

case.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
case.localized_title: Les informations vous concernant sont recueillies par des tiers
case.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.

points.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

case.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes
case.localized_title: Vous êtes contraint de recourir à l'arbitrage obligatoire en cas de litige
case.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.

points.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations

case.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations
case.localized_title: Les tiers utilisés par le service sont soumis à des obligations de confidentialité
case.description: The Third Parties accessing your personal information must keep it confidential and only use it for limited purposes.

points.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you

case.title: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you
case.localized_title: Ce service se réserve le droit de divulguer vos informations personnelles sans vous en informer
case.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.

points.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

case.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
case.localized_title: Ce service transmet vos données personnelles à des tiers impliqués dans son fonctionnement
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.

points.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

case.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez demander l'accès, la correction et/ou la suppression de vos données
case.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
points.analysis: Since these cookies are used in third-party websites as well, we can assume these are third-party cookies and not the service's own.

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
case.localized_title: Les cookies de tiers sont utilisés pour la publicité
case.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.

points.title: Your Personal data may be sold unless you live in California and you opt out

case.title: Your Personal data may be sold unless you opt out
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles peuvent être vendues, à moins que vous ne viviez en Californie et que vous ne vous y opposiez.
case.description: There is a form to opt-out (typically California's CCPA) of the selling of your personal data. This is a bad a point because there are many services that don't have this form due to not selling your data in the first place.

points.title: App required for this service requires broad device permissions
points.analysis: The app doesn't really require those permissions, but if the user grants access to them, information about location and contacts may be used for "recommendations", which might include marketing (https://edit.tosdr.org/points/23656).

case.title: App required for this service requires broad device permissions
case.localized_title: L'application requise pour ce service nécessite des autorisations étendues de l'appareil.
case.description: The app of the service requires more device permissions than necessary. As a consequence it can compromise your privacy by accessing many functions and information from your device, such as precise location, contacts, device identifiers etc.

points.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

case.title: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs
case.localized_title: Ce service n'assume aucune responsabilité pour les pertes ou les dommages résultant de toute question relative au service.
case.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.
